    • draw

      public void draw​(int windowWidth, int windowHeight)
      Draw function. Elements should be added here in each scene. Window sizes are used to anchor elements to anywhere in the scene
      Parameters:
      windowWidth - The width of the window
      windowHeight - The height of the window
